target.name: usage
target.echo:
TARGETS
DEPLOYMENT of ALL blastdbs: deployNoGenBankDownload: calls all processX targets except GenBank because this one takes too long to run, and instead just copies all gbk_* dbs to the BLASTSERVER_BLAST_DATABASE_PATH you've set in the env file.
deployCron: deploys cron tab on genomix if user is informix and hostname is genomix. runAll: does a full load of all Dbs; will take over 24 hours to complete. graph: graphs current build process
INDIVIDUAL DEPLOYMENT of blastdbs: processGenBank : creates all GB blastdbs processEnsembl : creates Ensembl blastdbs processRefSeq : creates RefSeq blastdbs processSPTrEMBL : creates SP blastdbs processTIGR : creates TIGR blastdbs processTrace : creates Trace blastdbs processzfin_microRNA : creates Curated* and Loaded* microRNA blastdbs processzfin_cdna : creates zfin_cdna blastdbs processzfin_genomicDNA : creates zfin_genomicDNA blastdbs processzfin_mrph : creates zfin_mrph blastdbs processzfin_publishedProtein : creates publishedProtein blastdbs processzfin_publishedRNA : creates publishedRNA blastdbs processzfin_unreleasedRNA : creates unreleasedRNA blastdbs processzfin_unreleasedProtein : creates unreleaedProtein blastdbs processzfin_vega : creates vega blastdbs processzfin_wz : creates wgz blastdbs processzfin_xpat_cdna : creates ZFINGenesWithExpression blastdbs
MAINTENANCE revertX: using naming convention above, X = whatever db you're interested in reverting. It moves what was in backup forward to Current.
